title:
What happen to the lady Sheriff off duty that passed a patrol car at a high rate of speed and rolled her car near Shallotte several month ago?

Charged? What actions were taken?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20101019/ARTICLES/101019561/1017/news0102?Title=Charge-against-deputy-who-wrecked-car-at-100-mph-dismissed I apologize for the delay in answering your question. As you can see, it resulted in a story at StarNewsOnline.com.
